doc.previous: The metric tensor allows one to define the inner product of two vectors which in turn allows one to assign a magnitude to the vector Given the four dimensional nature of spacetime the Minkowski metric has components valid in any inertial reference frame which can be arranged in a 4 4 matrix
doc.after: which is equal to its reciprocal in those frames Throughout we use the signs as above different authors use different conventions see Minkowski metric alternative signs
